file_insights.changes_summary: Added descriptionId from context to support aria-describedby reference

patterns_discovered: Context-based ID generation for ARIA attributes
Conditional ID assignment in React components
gotchas_discovered: Requires existing context setup to generate descriptionId
Assumes context may be undefined, uses optional chaining
recommendations: Ensure AlertDialogContext provides consistent descriptionId generation
Add prop type validation for descriptionId
Consider fallback mechanism if context is not available
